page_content: Discusses the infrastructure for sustainable wood utilization and forest care in the Canton of Luzern.
Provides tax declaration software for legal entities and system requirements.
Discusses ICT support for educational infrastructure, including software and hardware.
Discusses the organization and management of forest lands in the Canton of Luzern.
Discusses the legal regulations for foreigners acquiring land in Switzerland.
Discusses financial reforms and adjustments in the Canton of Luzern.
Provides a PDF form for filing property gain tax and mentions the requirement of Adobe Reader for correct display.
Provides downloadable materials like forms, guides, and reports in various sectors including construction and spatial planning.
Provides templates and sample documents for various administrative and zoning processes.
Provides guidance for National and Council elections in 2023, including contact information for media and organizational queries.
Provides a contact form for the Department of Informatics in Luzern, not to be used for support or password issues.
